title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1668/85 of 18 June 1985 classifying goods in subheading 24.02 C of the Common Customs Tariff
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1668/85
of 18 June 1985
classifying goods in subheading 24.02 C of the Common Customs Tariff
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Cut cigarette rag which is the finished mixture of tobacco for the manufacture of cigarettes shall be classified in the Common Customs Tariff in subheading:
24.02 Manufactured tobacco; tobacco extracts and essences:
C. Smoking tobacco.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the 21st day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 June 1985.
For the Commission
COCKFIELD
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 14, 21. 1. 1969, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 191, 16. 7. 1984, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 171, 22. 7. 1968, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 320, 10. 12. 1984, p. 1.
